flash.order_book.OrderProcessing module

class flash.order_book.OrderProcessing.OrderBook(incoming_orders: HM)[source]

Bases: object

flowOrderHandle(order: OrderHandler) → None[source]

Description

This method updates on fly the containers for asks and bids offers. It takes new offer and if this is a ‘buy’ offer then it puts on the heap, otherwise it puts on mean heap.

param order:

New order which is passing through a gate.

type order:

OrderHandler

matchingEngine(incoming_order: OrderHandler, matched_order: OrderHandler)[source]

Description

This function update trade if match on the market happen. If both quantities are equal then we wipe out matched order from the book.

param incoming_order:

New order which just arrived from client.

type incoming_order:

OrderHandler

param matched_order:

Order that already exists in the book and deal may happen with the new offer.

type matched_order:

OrderHandler

removeOrder(existing_order: OrderHandler, id_for_remove: int)[source]

Description

Remove the record from book after cancel out two trades.

param existing_order:

Order that has been associated with new Order and thus removed from book.

type existing_order:

OrderHandler

Note

This happen only if volume of two trades are the same.
